mapper.select: select city from code where codegroup_id='ct';
mapper.insert: insert into team ( team_name, team_fdate, team_fee, code_key, team_intro, team_emblem, team_notice, team_num, team_recruit_yn) values (#{team_name}, now(), #{team_fee}, #{code_key}, #{team_intro}, #{team_emblem}, #{team_notice}, #{team_num}, #{team_recruit_yn})
